channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Whitney at the BBC
channel.desc: A reflection on Whitney Houston's best performances at the BBC celebrates the hit songs of one of the most successful artists in the world. Taking a sonic trip through the star's career, from the 1985 hit 'Saving all My Love for you', all the way through the 80s, 90s and 00s, this selection of songs educates on the artist's appeal to audiences everywhere and her ability to gain longstanding fans across multiple decades. It also reflects on why the singer's untimely death was such a deep loss.
